title: Nearly 300 cops for Sto. Niño feast
text: Authorities reiterated the city-wide gun ban in Davao City and so, permit to carry firearms outside residence (PTCFOR) is suspended. Only the members of the PNP, Armed Forces of the Philippines and other law enforcement agencies on duty and are wearing prescribed uniforms are allowed to carry firearms. (JCR)
meta_description: THE Talomo Police Station will be deploying nearly 300 policemen to ensure the security at Shrine Hills, Matina, Davao City during the celebration of the Feast
